title: Knockout!
description: Interpol cop, Anna Leyton, spirals down into a hopeless vortex of sexual and emotional passionas she fights to keep her professional cool. Who is deceiving who in this fast moving ride across continents?What motivates her art loving prize-bull of a lover Freddie La Salle? The power of love and trust stands against greed and crime as conflicting forces grapple for that knockout punch.Knockout! A romance novel with a twist of suspense that will take you on a roller coaster ride of passion, deception and love.
author: Emma Calin
